course_title: Pediatric Acute Care NP Practicum II
course_description: This course focuses on care delivery to acutely ill or injured children/families in varied settings, hospitals and clinics. Emphasis is on advanced health assessment, communication with infants/children and families, health promotion/maintenance, and acute problems in pediatric acute care.
prerequisites: NRSG 757D and NRSG 758D as prerequisites, NRSG 759D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 5231, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
